channel.title: Comments on: Gordon Ramsay, the MasterChef Judges and The Good Food and Wine Show 3-5 July 2009

item.title: By: Foodlover
item.dc:creator: Foodlover
item.description: aren't the guys from masterchef great? met george and matt this monday and they were such nice people. i'm loving reading your blog - will try to get a bit more into baking too :)
item.content:encoded:
aren’t the guys from masterchef great? met george and matt this monday and they were such nice people.
i’m loving reading your blog – will try to get a bit more into baking too ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Rilsta
item.dc:creator: Rilsta
item.description: Awesome photos of the day! You did well in taking photos of the chefs! You must be really tall or George is really short! :P
item.content:encoded: Awesome photos of the day! You did well in taking photos of the chefs! You must be really tall or George is really short! ðŸ˜›

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
Hi Lorraine - Hehe... no George isn't sitting down.. I'm just pretty tall :) Gordon was absolutely lovely and had a sparkle to his eyes
Hi Cakelaw - Thanks! We did have a fun day :)
Hi Simon - It was heaps exciting!
Hi Beta Gal - The biscotti was lovely... it's already all eaten... mmmmm
Hi Steph - Hehehe.. it was lots of fun
Hi Alexandra - Sure did!
Hi Arwen - I'm very excited to try some of the new recipes from their books... now to find the time... :P
Hi FFichiban - Yeah, he's standing... and I don't even have heels on...:P
Hi Jasmine - I just realised I put 2 photos of pannacotta up.... whoops.. they both looked so nice!!!
Hi Sophia - Yeah, he didn't swear much at all.... maybe once...
Hi Maria - They were both lovely than I had expected. I hope I can make some of the food for the books soon...
Hi Belle - Thanks, I wish I had seen a few more celeb up close...
Hi Trisha - Very cool. I wish I had bought some more food from there.. but our bags were already so heavy :)
item.content:encoded:
Hi Lorraine – Hehe… no George isn’t sitting down.. I’m just pretty tall ðŸ™‚ Gordon was absolutely lovely and had a sparkle to his eyes

Hi Cakelaw – Thanks! We did have a fun day ðŸ™‚

Hi Simon – It was heaps exciting!

Hi Beta Gal – The biscotti was lovely… it’s already all eaten… mmmmm

Hi Steph – Hehehe.. it was lots of fun

Hi Alexandra – Sure did!

Hi Arwen – I’m very excited to try some of the new recipes from their books… now to find the time… ðŸ˜›

Hi FFichiban – Yeah, he’s standing… and I don’t even have heels on…:P

Hi Jasmine – I just realised I put 2 photos of pannacotta up…. whoops.. they both looked so nice!!!

Hi Sophia – Yeah, he didn’t swear much at all…. maybe once…

Hi Maria – They were both lovely than I had expected. I hope I can make some of the food for the books soon…

Hi Belle – Thanks, I wish I had seen a few more celeb up close…

Hi Trisha – Very cool. I wish I had bought some more food from there.. but our bags were already so heavy ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Trisha
item.dc:creator: Trisha
item.description: It's my first GF&WS too and I have to say I was very impressed with the food showcased and also with the loot I managed to get! :) Fantastic celebrity chef opportunities you have there.
item.content:encoded: It’s my first GF&WS too and I have to say I was very impressed with the food showcased and also with the loot I managed to get! ðŸ™‚ Fantastic celebrity chef opportunities you have there.

item.title: By: Belle@OohLook
item.dc:creator: Belle@OohLook
item.description: You got some great shots with the celebrity chefs, lucky thing! And I agree that you'd go to the show as much for the celeb-spotting as for the food...
item.content:encoded: You got some great shots with the celebrity chefs, lucky thing! And I agree that you’d go to the show as much for the celeb-spotting as for the food…

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: what an awesome day out. Its always lovely to meet famous people and they are lovelier than you imagine. I look forward to seeing loads of press club and Gordon Ramsay inspired posts!
item.content:encoded: what an awesome day out. Its always lovely to meet famous people and they are lovelier than you imagine. I look forward to seeing loads of press club and Gordon Ramsay inspired posts!

item.title: By: Sophia
item.dc:creator: Sophia
item.description: Oh man! I am so jealous! Gordon is my hero, despite his swearing on TV!
item.content:encoded: Oh man! I am so jealous! Gordon is my hero, despite his swearing on TV!

item.title: By: jasmine
item.dc:creator: jasmine
item.description:
That panna cotta looks heavenly. Lucky you for attending--I've heard similar things about GR, from those who've met him...
j
item.content:encoded:
That panna cotta looks heavenly. Lucky you for attending–I’ve heard similar things about GR, from those who’ve met him…

j

item.title: By: FFichiban
item.dc:creator: FFichiban
item.description: Hee hee good work getting the autographs and meeting the chefs in person! And yeah is George sitting or standing hee hee?
item.content:encoded: Hee hee good work getting the autographs and meeting the chefs in person! And yeah is George sitting or standing hee hee?

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: Two new cookbooks - you're going to be a busy girl! Looks like you had a great day, and it's so nice that the chefs were friendly.
item.content:encoded: Two new cookbooks – you’re going to be a busy girl! Looks like you had a great day, and it’s so nice that the chefs were friendly.
